name: Stickey Keys
description:
Play as Stickey the slime as you pick up keys and separate your amorphous body to solve puzzles. Climb through vents, fall through grates, press some buttons, and maybe even find an Escape?

"The game can be a little buggy/janky at times, and I forgot to preload the audio, sorrey ;~;" - SparklyJuiceJuice

Made for the GDevelop Game Jam #3, with the theme of Seperation.

Made in 6 days by SparklyJuiceJuice and Acatsuki.

Music is Airship Serenity by Kevin Macleod.
